welcome_message_body: Welcome to Savage, United States! Get ready to experience our charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Savage has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis - St. Paul International Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Flying Cloud Airport, where all commercial flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights at Flying Cloud Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Executive Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Crystal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, retail stores, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Crystal Airport provides exclusive services for private and corporate aircraft, including a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Anoka County-Blaine Airport, handling all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
